name: Contact Templates
description: Collection of 5 different contact page designs, from minimalist to corporate

templates.name: Minimalist Contact
templates.description: Clean and simple design with centered form
templates.preview: Centered form with minimalist design on light gray background

templates.name: Modern Contact
templates.description: Modern design with side contact information and gradients
templates.preview: Split layout with form and contact information, colorful gradients

templates.name: Creative Contact
templates.description: Vibrant design with floating elements and eye-catching colors
templates.preview: Radial gradient background, floating elements and glassmorphism form

templates.name: Corporate Contact
templates.description: Professional design with statistics and complete business form
templates.preview: Dark header, stats in cards, professional form with multiple fields

templates.name: Startup Contact
templates.description: Dynamic design focused on startups with tech elements and animations
templates.preview: Dark background with tech elements, startup form with specific fields
